<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="ABBYY Vantage Integration">3cbf021e832812100bafad20ceaad302</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:e591d292836812100bafad20ceaad3c4</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Start Transaction</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
    // Create a button element
    var myButton = document.createElement('button');
    myButton.innerHTML = 'Custom Button';
    
    // Add an ID or class for styling or targeting the button later
myButton.id = 'myCustomButton';
    
    // Append the button to a specific location on the form
    document.querySelector('div#element_io_iframe').appendChild(myButton);
    
    // Add an event listener to perform actions when clicked
    myButton.onclick = function() {
        alert('Button Clicked!');
        // Additional functionality like form validation or navigation can be added here
    };
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Bhuvan</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-09-13 06:49:05</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>f3e0df26832496100bafad20ceaad3fb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Start Transaction</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Claims Management System - Raj" source="x_1523132_claims_m">55a74ce683d096100bafad20ceaad3c3</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Claims Management System - Raj">55a74ce683d096100bafad20ceaad3c3</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_f3e0df26832496100bafad20ceaad3fb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Bhuvan</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-13 06:52:10</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>false</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
